name: Adagio Holdings
description: Founded by retired Naval logistics personnel, Adagio found success supporting the voracious resource appetite of the Messer-era military-industrial complex through their salvaging operations. After the end of the Messer regime, Adagio, like many other military contractors, lost their contract, and the company was forced to find new sources of revenue. This ultimately led Adagio begin reselling salvage rights they’ve acquired to independent captains and other enterprises of various sizes.
